text: Zsolt István Kurtosi (born 21 March 1971 in Kiskunfélegyháza) is a Hungarian decathlete. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1995 |World Indoor Championships |Barcelona, Spain | 9th |Heptathlon |- |1996 |Hypo- Meeting |Götzis, Austria |12th |Decathlon |- |1997 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |12th |Decathlon |- |rowspan=3|1998 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |13th |Decathlon |- |European Championships |Budapest, Hungary | 9th |Decathlon |- |IAAF World Combined Events Challenge |several places |12th |Decathlon |- |rowspan=2|1999 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |11th |Decathlon |- |IAAF World Combined Events Challenge |several places |11th |Decathlon |- |rowspan=2|2000 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |13th |Decathlon |- |Olympic Games |Sydney, Australia | 11th |Decathlon |8149 pts = PB |- |rowspan=2|2001 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |7th |Decathlon |- |World Championships |Edmonton, Canada | 13th |Decathlon |- |rowspan=3|2002 |European Indoor Championships |Vienna, Austria | 6th |Heptathlon |- |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |DNF |Decathlon |- |European Championships |Munich, Germany |11th |Decathlon |- |2003 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |DNF |Decathlon |- |2004 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |17th |Decathlon |- |2005 |Hypo-Meeting |Götzis, Austria |DNF |Decathlon |} ==External links== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kiskunfélegyháza Category:Hungarian decathletes Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Hungary Category:Olympic bobsledders of Hungary Category:Bobsledders at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Hungarian male bobsledders
title: Zsolt Kürtösi
